mapper.insert: insert into tbl_recipe(rno, r_title, r_content, userid, r_pic) values(seq_recipe_rno.nextval, #{r_title}, #{r_content}, #{userid}, #{r_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_recipe order by rno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_recipe set r_title = #{r_title}, r_content = #{r_content}, r_pic = #{r_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rno = #{rno}
update tbl_recipe set r_viewcnt = #{viewcnt} + 1 where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from tbl_recipe order by r_viewcnt desc) where rownum <= 3

mapper.delete: delete from tbl_recipe_like where rno = #{rno} and userid = #{userid}
